thread.title: Randi Caldon
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Randi Caldon

author: Randi Caldon
title: Randi Caldon
text: The dress I ordered for my daughter had the zipper split in the back the first time we tried it on-just a freak thing to have happen. The ladies at Peaches Boutique were happy to assist and figure out what the best course of action was, were helpful with suggestions, and very apologetic. Could not ask for better customer service. And the dress is lovely! I would order from them again with no hesitation.
